com.google.android.drdat.cl.DrdatLogin

DrdatLogin Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

What the drdat gui app uses to get cached login information.

This is a very simple content provider that only checks the user name and password. It will cache the last login to allow us to automatically populate log in forms.

Author:
cal

Override Uri insert ( Uri  uri,
ContentValues  values 
)

Gets the entered email and password and saves it to drdat_login database managed by DrdatLoginCache.

Will not save an invalid email and password.

Parameters:
uri - how this was called (not used)
values - values including email and password

Override boolean onCreate (  ) 

Override Cursor query ( Uri  uri,
String[]  projection,
String  selection,
String[]  selectionArgs,
String  sortOrder 
)

Find the email and password entered and return the md5 hash of the password.

Parameters:
uri - uri we were called with
projection - fields to get (not used)
selection - how to find them (not used)
selectionArgs - may contain a user name and password
sortOrder - order by clause (not used)
Returns:
cursor with at least the passwordMD5 field

static boolean newLogin ( String  email,
String  passwordMD5 
) [static]

Tells us if we've seen this login before in this session.

If we have seen it this session check whether they had logged in before.

Parameters:
email 
passwordMD5 
Returns:
true if either we haven't seen this login before or they've never logged in before
